meals.name: Toasted bread with eggs and meat
meals.comment:
1. Toast bread (preferably rye bread)
2. Cook egg as fried egg or scrambled
3. Make sandwich with eggs and cold cuts
4. Eat pineapple on the side

meals.name: Omelet with asparagus
meals.comment:
1. Preheat oven to 210 degrees C.
2. Spread oil in a pan.
3. Add egg whites, asparagus, garlic, onions and peppers.
4. Bake in the oven for about 15-18 min. (To the eggs are finished)
5. Serve

meals.name: Raspberry and nut smoothie
meals.comment:
Note: To get creamy smoothie - use frozen bananas. Peel bananas and freeze down in ziplock bag beforehand. Use protein powder with your favorite flavour.
1. Mix all ingredients in a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.

meals.name: Vegan quinoa salat
meals.comment:
1. Cook quinoa in salted water
2. Fry the oumph in sesame oil in a pan with your favourite spices.
3. Cut bell pepper, onion and tomato mix it with sweetcorn and quinoa when it's done. 
Serve with oumph and top with chopped parsley.

meals.name: Vegan oats with berries
meals.comment:
1. Heat oats, almond milk and protein powder. Use a bit of water if it's too thick.
2. Top with berries and cinnamon

product.name: Very Vanilla Vegan (protein Powder - Peas And Rice)

meals.name: Vegetarian chocolate brownie
meals.comment:
Tip: You can bigger portions, divide in even sizes and keep in fridge to have snacks for several days.
1. Pre-heat oven to 284F degrees (140C) and prepare a small cake tin.
2. Mix soy flour, oat flour, cocoa powder, protein powder, baking powder (and sweetener if using.)
3. Combine wet ingredients (egg whites, apple sauce) except water.
4. Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and stir until gooey.
5. Add enough water to loosen mixture.
6. Pour into cake tin and bake for around 20 minutes until the cake springs back when you touch it.
7. Leave to cool and serve with a little low sugar/fat yoghurt, crème fraiche or vanilla chogurt (a mixture of light cream cheese and yogurt).

meals.name: Peanut granola with skyr
meals.comment:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F
2. Mix peanut powder, protein powder, oats and baking powder.
3. Add peanutbutter and egg whites. Adjust thickness with water
4. Spread it in a caserolle with baking paper. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
5. After 10 minutes; Give et a god stir
6. Bake for another 10 minutes.
Serve skyr topped with granola
Enjoy!

product.name: Very Vanilla Vegan (protein Powder - Peas And Rice)

meals.name: Warm vegan oatmeal with berries
meals.comment:
1. Heat oats, protein powder, oat milk and chia in a pot. Adjust with water if it's too thick.
2. Top with berries and cinnamon

meals.name: Salad with apple and chicken
meals.comment:
1. Rinse the salad and spread it on a large dish.
2. Rinse the apples, cut them into boats and slice the squash.
3. Brush apples and squash with oil and roast them for 2 minutes on each side.
4. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Grill the chicken breasts approx. 7-8 minutes on each side until they are finished.
5. Put the pine nuts on a dry pan and roast until golden.
6. Spread apples, tomatoes, squash, goat cheese, pine nuts and tomato on the salad.
7. Cut the chicken breasts into smaller pieces and add them to the salad.

meals.name: Vegan lasagne
meals.comment:
1. Preheat oven to 390 F
2. Cook the vegan ground and chopped onion in a pan with olive oil.
3. Add garlic, tomatoes, broccoli and your favourite spices. Cook it for 10 min.
4. Cut slices of zucchini
5. In a casserole; Place layers of zucchini and the vegan ground mix. 
6. Bake for 20 min in the oven

meals.name: Seitan with rice and broccoli
meals.comment:
1. Cook the rice
2. While the rice cook; Fry the seitan with your favourite spices and sesame oil.
3. Add. broccoli, stir fry-mix, edamame beans and soya sauce. Fry for 5-10 minutes
4. Serve with the rice

meals.name: Vegan wraps
meals.comment:
1. Fry the vegan beef in a pan with sesame oil and  your favourite spices; e. g.cumin, garlic powder, chili, salt and pepper.
2. Warm the tortillas in the oven. 
3. Cut the vegetables and arrange it with the vegan ground in the tortilla. Top with lemon juice.

meals.name: Blueberry oatmeal
meals.comment:
1. Mix oats with water and protein powder isolat (choose your favorite flavour).
2. Cook in microwave 30 sec, stir, and repeat. (alternatively add sugar free sweetener)
3. Add peanutbutter, stir and put blueberries on top.

meals.name: Pita snack
meals.comment:
1. Add cheese, mayo, lettuce, chicken or turkey and tomato into pita bread.
Optional: Toast the pita

meals.name: Chia raspberry smoothie
meals.comment:
Note: Use frozen banana and raspberries for more creamy texture. Use protein powder in your favorite flavour.
1. Place raspberry, apple juice, yoghurt, banana, chia seeds, protein powder and vanilla extract (if desired) in a blender.
2. Blend until smooth

meals.name: Oatmeal squares
meals.comment:
1. Preheat oven to 340 degrees F
2. Mix oats, cinnamon, baking powder, oat milk, apple sauce and a pinch of salt.
3. Pour the mix into a casserole with baking papir. Bake until the surface is golden og cut it into squares.

meals.name: Avocado salad
meals.comment:
1. Cook the soybean spaghetti. If the edamame beans are frozen; Use the water to warm up the beans.
2. Chop the veggies, and mix them in a bowl.
3. Make a quick dressing with lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, pepper and your favourite spices.
4. Top the salat with the dressing and have the spaghetti on the side.

meals.name: Plaice with sun-dried tomatoes
meals.comment:
1. Cook the rice
2. Fry the fish in a nonstick pan with soya sauce and your favourite spices.
3. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and mix them with the rice when it's done.
Top with lemon juice
Enjoy!

meals.name: Falafel pita
meals.comment:
1. Warm falafel balls in the oven and cook the spaghetti.
2. Cut the tomatoes and salat.
3. Make a dressing from soya, yogurt, salt pepper and cumin.
4. Warm the edamame beans and the bread.

meals.name: Beef stroganof with mushrooms
meals.comment:
1. Peel and chop the potatoes i small pieces and boil them till tender.
Drain them and mash them to a puré with milk, mustard salt and pepper.
2.Cut garlic and onion. Fry on a non-stick pan for 4-5 minutes. Add salt, pepper and your favourite spices.
3. Chop leek finely and add them to the pan with yogurt. Add bouillon water to adjust thickness. Let it simmer
Enjoy with chopped parsley.

meals.name: Falafel pita
meals.comment:
1. Warm falafel balls in the oven and cook the spaghetti.
2. Cut the tomatoes and salat.
3. Make a dressing from soya, yogurt, salt pepper and cumin.
4. Warm the edamame beans and the bread.

meals.name: Falafel pita
meals.comment:
1. Warm falafel balls in the oven and cook the spaghetti.
2. Cut the tomatoes and salat.
3. Make a dressing from soya, yogurt, salt pepper and cumin.
4. Warm the edamame beans and the bread.

71335.comment:
Hi John Doe,

    Welcome to your meal plan!
 

    You may replace any meal from this plan with meals from one of the other meal plans
    that I have created for you.
 

    Beside the food listed in this meal plan, I recommend that you consume daily:
    - 1 multi vitamin
    - 3 fish oil capsules


    Remember to drink 8-12 glasses of water every day. For every cup of tea or coffee you drink
    you need to add an extra glass of water.


    Eating healthy doesn't have to be boring.


    Enjoy, Alexei Chernishov

meals.name: Quick spanish omelette
meals.comment:
1. Grate the potatoes, and dice the onion & asparagus.
2. Stir mixture on pan
3. Prepare eggs and chicken while mixture is cooking
4. When mixture is golden brown, add the eggs & chicken and mix before letting stay at low heat.
5. Use a plate wider than pan, to flip the omelette
6. Eat toasted bread on the side

meals.name: Peanut butter oatmeal cookies
meals.comment:
Note: Make bigger portions if you want to save time in the kitchen.
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2. Combine dry ingredients in a medium bowl.
3. Add peanut butter and remaining wet ingredients, mixing until combined.
4. Fold in chocolate chips (mini).
5. Lightly coat a baking sheet with cooking spray.
6. Scoop cookie dough onto prepared sheet by rounded tablespoonfuls.
7. Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until edges are firm and golden brown.
8. Let cool 5-10 minutes before eating. Store any leftovers up to one week at room temperature.

product.name: Protein Powder. Whey Isolate & Concentration. Tasty Vanilla
Archway Home Style Cookies. Chocolate Chip Ice Box

meals.name: Protein bread sandwich
meals.comment:
1. Toast your protein bread.
2. Add low fat cream cheese, cold cuts and vegetables.
3. Slice in two's

meals.name: Enchilada on the go
meals.comment:
1. Add finely chopped vegetables with deli meat into enchilada or tortilla
2. Add some low carb taco sauce on top

meals.name: Coffee cocoa smoothie
meals.comment:
1. Add all ingredients except rice cakes in a mixer.
2. Add icecubes and almond milk or regular milk.
3. Blend until mixed and all icecubes are crushed. 
4. Add artificial sweetener if need.
5. Eat rice cakes on the side.

meals.name: Tuna steak with avocado salad
meals.comment:
1. Heat tuna steak on a frying pan for 2-3 minutes until golden. 
2. Heat asparagus and beans on pan or in microwave. 
3. Chop tomato and avocado in cubes and chop onion 
4. Add a little lemon juice, oliveoil and seasoning. Add fresh oregano.
5. Mix cold rice and lima beans into salad.

meals.name: Turkey sandwich with avocado and bell pepper
meals.comment:
1. Use rye bread if possible
2. Add avocado, chopped onion, tomato and slices of turkey or chicken deli meat.
Optional: Slice in halves and toast the sandwich

meals.name: No bake protein balls
meals.comment:
Note: Make bigger portions, and keep in fridge.
1. Add oats, proteinpowder and a little cinnamon in a bowl and mix
2. Add honey, peanutbutter, and vanilla extract. Stir to combine.
3. (optional: add a little raisins) Mixture should be sticky but still crumbly.
4. Slowly add tablespoon of water, milk, almondmilk until mixture becomes one sticky ball
5. Roll into small balls and keep in fridge for at least 30 minutes.

meals.name: Tuna with potatoes
meals.comment:
1. Cook potatoes. 
2. When potatoes are cooled down, add tuna after drained from water.
3. Mix with favorite vegetables (broccoli, lettuce, tomatoes etc.) and avocado. (add a little low carb low fat dressing + fresh spices)
4. Pack in plastic box, and put in fridge if you want to bring with you later on

meals.name: Overnight peachy oats
meals.comment:
1. Add all ingredients in a air sealed food box or jar and stir until fully combined
2. Leave the box in the fridge over night, and eat for breakfast
( If you add a little fruit eat next day. If no fruit, it will stay fresh for 2-3 days. )

meals.name: Omelette with ham
meals.comment:
1. Scramble ham, eggs and spinach. (Frozen spinach are cooked first)
2. Eat toasted bread on the side

meals.name: Protein shake & protein bar
meals.comment:
Quick meal on the go.
1. Eat protein bar, drink a shake and have some rice cakes

meals.name: Quick meal: rice cakes with cold cuts
meals.comment:
Snack on the go:
Rice cakes with chicken cold cuts and a little bell peber.

meals.name: Pita pizza
meals.comment:
1. Slice pita bread in half
2. Add ingredients and heat in oven for 10-15 minutes or in 30 sec bursts in micro wave for 2-3 minutes.
3. Add oregano and pinch of salt.

meals.name: Sherbet ice cream
meals.comment:
1. Blend frozen fruits / berries, honey with yogurt + protein powder (pick your fav flavour) + vitargo (buy online)
2a. (optional) If smoothie, add a little water and ice cubes
2.a (optional) If ice cream, pour in a plastic container and put in freezer for 1-2 hours.

meals.name: Chicken thai dish
meals.comment:
1. Prepare sliced pieces of chicken in a pan
2. Add thai curry paste with coconut milk in the pan
3. Add favorite vegetables
4. Serve rice

meals.name: Crispbread with a protein shake
meals.comment: Enjoy some low fat crisp breads and drink a protein shake.

meals.name: Omelette with ham, cheese and bread
meals.comment:
1. Add eggs and egg whites to preheated pan
2. Add pork, diced tomatoes and mozzarella.
3. Cook at low heat, and flip by using a plate larger than pan.
4. Add on toasted bread

meals.name: Banana protein oats
meals.comment:
1. Shake protein powder with ice cold water.
2. Pour shake over oats and mix with spoon.
3. Add banana with chopped almonds

meals.name: Muesli with yogurt and apple this is very long title ever seen to test in on android device
meals.comment:
1. Add greek yogurt (low fat & low sugar) with muesli in tall glass or bowl.
2. Add chopped almonds and apple (or berries) on top.
